problem.p: This problem was incorrect and has been changed to 0 points. The text is maintained here as a placeholder.

p.del: Which of these quantities is conserved from the moment immediately before the collision to the moment immediately after the collision?

choicegroup.choice: Linear momentum of the 2-bars system only
Angular momentum of the 2-bars system (about the pivot point) only
Kinetic energy of the 2-bars system only
Mechanical energy of the 2-bars-Earth system only
